review.title: “An employee with a positive attitude will thrive there.The key is keeping the positive atitude.”
review.pros: Pros – The ability to work as a team helps an young or inexperienced employee gain confidence and skills to succeed in the wholesale trade market.
review.cons: Cons – The likelihood of a young or inexperienced employee to gain the skills to succeed in the wholesale trade market is somewhat constrained by outside economic market forces .
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – I would suggest working on the things that the great companies do. The companies that thrive have leadership that implements full time company wide training and recruitment departments.
